Describes how to configure SDL_Config for your own needs.

First, you should know, that in order to change behaviour of SDL_Config, you must make changes directly in SDL config cfg.h file, then recompile SDL_Config, and finally recompile your application.

For the list of things that you can easily change, open aforementioned SDL config cfg.h and look through all of the defines and read comments.  Fortunately, there’s also other method - SDL config cfg.h is documented using Natural Docs, so click on the link on the left, and you’ll go to page where you still have to read some text, but that text at least should be nicely formated ;-)
Either ways, eventually you always need to open that file and edit it by hand.
